thread.title: Single Mom, single income
thread.title_full: FlightHub reviewed by Single Mom, single income

author: Single Mom, single income
title: Single Mom, single income
text: I surprised my daughter with a trip to San Diego for her 21st birthday and because of that I wanted to make sure that I find the best price out there as I am a single mom on a single income. Coming across Flight Hub was amazing! They had the best rates and everything was Quote: d in Canadian dollars so I didn't have to worry about conversion and the fluctuating dollar rates. Thank you Flight Hub!
